line.comment: * If at least one invader is alive, we don't do anything.
* Check what we have and what we need.
* Start to build a new ship.
* We have everything we need, start an invasion!
* Check if what we build is ready, and build it if possible.
* Zero Hour OCV construction malus from Xenon sectors in the galaxy
* $t = 'OCV currently building:' + $currentlyBuilding.class + ' / with scaling multiplier: ' + $scalingMultiplier + ' / general multiplier: ' + $generalMultiplier

sval.val: If at least one invader is alive, we don't do anything.
Check what we have and what we need.
Start to build a new ship.
We have everything we need, start an invasion!
Check if what we build is ready, and build it if possible.
Zero Hour OCV construction malus from Xenon sectors in the galaxy
$t = 'OCV currently building:' + $currentlyBuilding.class + ' / with scaling multiplier: ' + $scalingMultiplier + ' / general multiplier: ' + $generalMultiplier
